goals__remit: Handelsblatt GmbH is a multimedia company in Germany offering print, digital and mobile media with its main brands "Handelsblatt" and "WirtschaftsWoche". Germany´s leading business daily "Handelsblatt" is also published in a digital English version, "Handelsblatt Global Edition". The company's strategy focuses on high-quality journalism.
